name: When Pigs Glide
description:
When Pigs Glide!

Sid the pig wandered off from his farm... Take control of him and his magical wings to help bring him back safe and sound!

This game features...

9 fun and challenging levels,

4 original songs,

Ending cutscene,

Collectibles,

P0RTALS,

...and more!

(Playing in full screen is highly recommended!)
